Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.controller

Class Observable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.controller.Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Controller
public abstract class Observable extends Object
This class acts as the observer in the observer design pattern
